thread.title: Houston police respond to reports of shots fired at major hospital
thread.title_full: Houston police respond to reports of shots fired at major hospital

title: Houston police respond to reports of shots fired at major hospital
text:
U.S. | Tue Feb 21, 2017 | 3:38pm EST Houston police respond to reports of shots fired at major hospital 
HOUSTON Houston police said they were responding to reports of shots being fired on Tuesday at Ben Taub Hospital, a major healthcare center in the city. 
There were no indications yet if anyone was injured or killed. Live aerial coverage provided by Houston TV station KHOU showed a few officers outside the facility with weapons drawn. 
(Reporting by Jon Herskovitz in Austin and the Houston Bureau; Editing by Leslie Adler) Next In U.S.
